name: Salesmate Messenger
author: Salesmate

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to chat messenger with another salesmate CRM user.

Features:

  • Chat with other users easily.
  • Need to provide only basic details like Workspace ID, Tenant ID and API key.

Getting Help

(Connect with Salesmate CRM)

Email: support AT salesmate DOT io
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload .zip file from “Add New” at admin site in “Plugin” menu OR put unzip folder directly at location “/wp-content/plugins”
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Goto Salesmate Messenger and provide required configuration from your Salesmate CRM Account
sections.changelog:
• That Is New Plug-in So there are No change log at now.
  • Updated the record duplication and updation feature
